results.title: Troubleshoot out of memory or low memory issues in SQL Server - SQL Server
results.description: Operation system product issues. For a detailed explanation of these and troubleshooting steps, refer to MSSQLSERVER_17890. You must identify which memory clerk(s) are responsible for the largest memory allocations to resolve this issue. For example, if you find that the OBJECTSTORE_LOCK_MANAGER memory clerk is showing a large memory allocation,.
